text: Thank you for the immense warmth, kindness, and empathy. You are the right person in the right place. Thank you for providing the necessary knowledge, making a stressful examination not so scary, for lifting my spirits and giving hope for better. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Anna Kowalska.

I DO NOT RECOMMEND!! I made an appointment with Dr. Anna Kowalska because almost a month of treatment by an internist for sinuses and throat did not yield results. I received an antibiotic that turned out not to be suitable for sinuses, and a recommendation not to sleep on my stomach without any basis. How do I know? I had a follow-up with another doctor who laughed at the ban on sleeping on the stomach - he had never heard of such a thing. And the internist and another ENT specialist stated that the antibiotic was not suitable for sinuses. A waste of time, money, and nerves. Maybe the diagnosis was okay but the treatment was a failure.

Dr. Anna Kowalska is very pleasant. The visit was specific, quick diagnosis, finding the cause of the ailment. I am starting treatment, I hope the ear will unblock quickly and the other accompanying ailments will disappear. I recommend Dr. Anna Kowalska.
